block.p: Margaret Lewis Bernstein, the daughter of Ann L. Bernstein and Daniel L. Bernstein of Bronxville, N.Y., was married yesterday to Christopher Michael Santana, a son of Marie and Robert Santana of Coral Gables, Fla. The Rev. Charles J. Minifie performed the ceremony at Christ Episcopal Church in Bronxville.
The bride and bridegroom, both 27, graduated from Amherst College, she cum laude.

Margaret Lewis Bernstein, the daughter of Ann L. Bernstein and Daniel L. Bernstein of Bronxville, N.Y., was married yesterday to Christopher Michael Santana, a son of Marie and Robert Santana of Coral Gables, Fla. The Rev. Charles J. Minifie performed the ceremony at Christ Episcopal Church in Bronxville.
The bride and bridegroom, both 27, graduated from Amherst College, she cum laude.
Mrs. Santana is a marketing director at the American Express Company in New York, where she works with merchants on Internet marketing programs. Her father, a lawyer, practices in New York.

Mr. Santana is a vice president of Lazard Freres & Company, the New York investment bank, and a bond trader in its high-yield trading group. His mother is a vice president for human resources in Miami with the AT&T Latin America Corporation, a telecommunications company formed by AT&T and the FirstCom Corporation. His father also works in Miami, where he is a director of Caribbean operations for the Concert Corporation, an international joint venture of AT&T and British Telecom.
